scripts.test: npx hardhat test && echo "Tests passed" || echo "Tests failed"
scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js && echo "Deploy Success" || echo "Deploy Failed"
scripts.deploy:node: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost && echo "Deploy Success"
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network rinkeby && echo "Deploy Success"
scripts.deploy:matic_test: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network matic_test && echo "Deploy Success"
